title: First Look: Vittoria’s Self-Expanding Gravel AirLiner Insert & Terreno T50 Mixed Tire
content:
The Vittoria AirLiner Gravel Light tire insert works with tires up to 50mm wide to offer pinch-flat protection to more riders than ever

Read the full article at First Look: Vittoria’s Self-Expanding Gravel AirLiner Insert & Terreno T50 Mixed Tire on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
